alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Ocean Ridge to near East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Wellington, Lake Worth, Palm Beach, Highland Beach, Ocean Ridge, Greenacres, Parkland, Palm Springs, Lantana, Atlantis, Cloud Lake, Loxahatchee NWR, Mission Bay, Palm Beach International Airport and Hamptons At Boca Raton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for southeastern Florida.
